languages.text: "Мое маленькое войско ведет войну против блюстителей. Мы режем патрули, отбиваем арестантов, караем тех, кто сотрудничает с врагом... и их близких". {n}Улыбка Владайма безжалостна и похожа на зубья капкана.{/n} "У Инцендии свои репрессии, у меня — свои. Каждый должен помнить, что сотрудничество с оккупантами имеет последствия".

"My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."
languages.original_text: "Мое маленькое войско ведет войну против блюстителей. Мы режем патрули, отбиваем арестантов, караем тех, кто сотрудничает с врагом... и их близких". {n}Улыбка Владайма безжалостна и похожа на зубья капкана.{/n} "У Инцендии свои репрессии, у меня — свои. Каждый должен помнить, что сотрудничество с оккупантами имеет последствия".

Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupation force."

languages.text: “我这支小小的军队正在与她的执法者开战。我们屠杀巡逻队，夺回被关押的同伴，惩罚那些与敌人合作的叛徒……或是与他们有密切关系的人。”{n}弗拉迪姆露出了残忍的微笑，仿佛陷阱的钢齿一般。{/n}“因森蒂娅以她的方式进行报复，我也会以我的方式进行报复。所有人都必须记住，那些勾结入侵者的叛徒，他们必将受到惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."

traits.locale_text: “我这支小小的军队正在与她的执法者开战。我们屠杀巡逻队，夺回被关押的同伴，惩罚那些与敌人合作的叛徒……或是与他们有密切关系的人。”{n}弗拉迪姆露出了残忍的微笑，仿佛陷阱的钢齿一般。{/n}“因森蒂娅以她的方式进行报复，我也会以我的方式进行报复。所有人都必须记住，与那些入侵者合作的人，绝不会免于惩罚。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「私の小さな軍はエンフォーサーに戦争を仕掛けている。パトロール隊を殺し、拘束者を奪い返し、敵の協力者、そして協力者と近い存在の者を、罰するんだ」{n}ヴラダイムの無情な笑顔は、ギザギザの鋼鉄の罠のようだ。{/n}「インセンディアにはインセンディアで報復していて、私には私のやり方がある。占領軍に協力すればそれなりの結末に陥る事を覚えておくべきだな」
languages.original_text: "My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."

traits.locale_text: 「私の小さな軍はエンフォーサーに戦争を仕掛けている。パトロール隊を殺し、拘束者を奪い返し、敵の協力者、そして協力者と近い存在の者を、罰するんだ」{n}ヴラダイムの無情な笑顔は、ギザギザの鋼鉄の罠のようだ。{/n}「インセンディアにはインセンディアで報復していて、私には私のやり方がある。占領軍に協力すればそれなりの結末に陥る事を覚えておくべきだな」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Mi pequeño ejército está librando una guerra contra el personal de seguridad. Masacramos patrullas, sometemos detenidos y castigamos a quienes colaboran con el enemigo... o son cercanos a alguien que lo hace». {n}La sonrisa despiadada de Vladaym es como un cepo.{/n} «Incendia está llevando a cabo sus represalias y yo, las mías. Todo el mundo debe recordar que hay consecuencias por colaborar con la fuerza de la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."

traits.locale_text: «Mi pequeño ejército está librando una guerra contra el personal de seguridad. Masacramos patrullas, sometemos detenidos y castigamos a quienes colaboran con el enemigo... o son cercanos a alguien que lo hace». {n}La sonrisa despiadada de Vladaym es como un cepo.{/n} «Incendia tiene sus represalias y yo tengo las mías. Todo el mundo debe recordar que hay consecuencias por colaborar con la fuerza de la corrupción».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Meine kleine Armee führt Krieg gegen die Enforcers. Wir schlachten Patrouillen ab, befreien Häftlinge und bestrafen Kollaborateure, die gemeinsame Sache mit dem Feind machen ... oder ihre Verwandten." {n}Vladayms gnadenloses Lächeln gleicht einer gezackten Stahlfalle.{/n} "Incendia hat ihre Repressalien, ich die meinen. Jeder muss wissen, dass es Konsequenzen hat, wenn man mit der Besatzungsmacht kollaboriert."
languages.original_text: "My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."

traits.locale_text: "Meine kleine Armee führt Krieg gegen die Enforcers. Wir schlachten Patrouillen ab, befreien Häftlinge und bestrafen Kollaborateure, die gemeinsame Sache mit dem Feind machen ... oder ihre Verwandten." {n}Vladayms gnadenloses Lächeln gleicht einer gezackten Stahlfalle.{/n} "Incendia hat ihre Repressalien, ich die meinen. Jeder muss wissen, dass es Konsequenzen hat, wenn man mit der Besatzungsmacht kollaboriert."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Ma petite armée combat les prévôts. Nous massacrons les patrouilles, libérons les détenus et punissions ceux qui collaborent avec l'ennemi... ou leurs proches, {n}explique Vladaym avec un sourire cruel semblable à un piège à loups.{/n} Tout comme Incendia, je mène mes propres représailles. Il faut que les gens comprennent que toute collaboration avec les forces d'occupation aura des conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."

traits.locale_text: « Ma petite armée combat les prévôts. Nous massacrons les patrouilles, libérons les détenus et punissions ceux qui collaborent avec l'ennemi... ou leurs proches, {n}explique Vladaym avec un sourire cruel semblable à un piège à loups.{/n} Tout comme Incendia, je mène mes propres représailles. Il faut que les gens comprennent que toute collaboration avec les forces d'occupation aura des conséquences. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ufak ordumla infazcılara karşı savaşıyoruz. Devriyelerini gebertip tutsaklarımızı kurtarıyoruz. Düşmanla iş tutanların... Yahut bunlarla ilişiği olanların cezasını da kesiyoruz." {n}Vladaym'ın haşin tebessümü, kertikli bir çelik tuzağı andırıyor.{/n} "İncendia'yla mücadelemiz karşılıklı. İşgalcilerle saf tutmanın cezasız kalmayacağını kimse unutmamalı."
languages.original_text: "My little army is waging war on the enforcers. We slaughter patrols, wrestle back detainees, and punish those who collaborate with the enemy... or are close to someone who does." {n}Vladaym's ruthless smile is like a jagged steel trap.{/n} "Incendia is conducting her reprisals and I am conducting mine. Everyone must remember that there are consequences for collaborating with the occupying force."
